newsitem.title: INDIA: Cricket-Australia 20 for one at lunch.
newsitem.headline: Cricket-Australia 20 for one at lunch.

text.p: Australia were 20 for one at lunch in their second innings on the third day of the one-off test against India at New Delhi's Feroze Shah Kotla ground on Saturday.
Michael Slater was caught by Mohammed Azharuddin at first slip off debutant David Johnson for zero.
Scores: Australia 182 and 20 for one (M.Taylor 10 not out, R. Ponting 10 not out)
India 361 (N.Mongia 152, S.Ganguly 66, R.Dravid 40, S.Joshi 23, A.Kapoor 22, P.Reiffel 3-35, P.McIntyre 3-103).
